definition: Book of Amos, one of the books of the Nevi'im and of the Christian Old Testament
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
